welcome_message_body: Welcome to Podolsk, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this unique destination has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ostafyevo International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Domodedovo Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Domodedovo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domodedovo Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Domodedovo Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Domodedovo Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Domodedovo Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vnukovo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Vnukovo Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
